1100101001010011 0010011010100110 1 -> sum: 1111000011111010, cout: 0
1011011011110000 0101110110000101 0 -> sum: 0001010001110101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
